# Globe Travel Photo App - Project Instructions

This is a Swift iOS application for tracking travel with a 3D rotating globe interface.

## Project Structure
- Swift/iOS application using SceneKit for 3D globe rendering
- Country and US state border visualization
- Photo management with country/state shape masking
- Album view for each visited location

## Development Guidelines
- Use Swift best practices and modern SwiftUI patterns
- Follow iOS Human Interface Guidelines
- Implement proper photo permission handling
- Use GeoJSON for geographical data

## Key Features
- 3D rotating globe with borders
- Zoom and selection of countries/states
- Photo album per location
- Photo masking to country/state shapes
